text: Jeff Fowler is an American director, animator and visual effects artist. He was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Short Film (Animated) for the short animated movie Gopher Broke (2004).Short Film Oscars: 2005 Oscars He made his first major movies with the live-action version of Sonic the Hedgehog in 2020.
